actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Parks Omnibus Management Act of 1998 to remove the exemption for nonprofit organizations from the general requirement to obtain commercial use authorizations.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks Omnibus Management Act of 1998 to remove the exemption for nonprofit organizations from the requirement to obtain commercial use authorizations unless taxable income is derived by the institution from the authorized use.

titles.title: To amend the National Parks Omnibus Management Act of 1998 to remove the exemption for nonprofit organizations from the general requirement to obtain commercial use authorizations.
